title: Franco De Vita - Al Norte del Sur - 1988
description:
Tercer disco, sumamente exitoso y que significo su lanzamiento internacional que ha perdurado hasta ahora

Artist: Franco De Vita
Album Title: Al Norte Del Sur 
Company: CBS - Sonografica
Genre: Rock-Pop
Release Year: 1988  (LP)

Tracks:  

01- Te Equivocaste Conmigo
02- Louis
03- Te Amo
04- Un Poco De Respeto
05- Aun Vivo
06- Soy Como Soy
07- Promesas
08- Esta Vez
09- Loco De Atar
10- Plaza Del Centro
11- Al Norte Del Sur

* All tracks by Franco de Vita

Musicians:
Vocals & Piano: Franco de Vita 
Guitars: Alvaro Falcon 
Keyboards & Programming: Miguel Arias 
Bass: Jose Velasquez &#039;El Patuo&#039; 
Drums: Ivan Velasquez 
Trumpet: Gustavo Aranguren 
Sax: Jose &#039;Pepe&#039; Vera 
Trombone: Hector Velasquez
  
Guest Musicians: 
Percussion: Carlos &#039;Nene&#039; Quintero  
Vibraphone: Freddy Roldan 
Solo Sax: Nelson Rangell  
Bass: Luis Emilio Mauri (track 4A) 
Tenor Sax: Ramon &#039;Moncho&#039; Carranza (tracks 1A, 4A, 1B) 
Trombone: Albany Castro (tracks 1A, 4A, 1B) 
Guitar: Joseito Romero (track 6B) 
Sax & Flute: Ezequiel Serrano (track 6B) 
Vocals: Simon Diaz & Enrique Lazo (track 6B) 
Background Vocals: Biella Da Costa, Lili Ortiz, Leonor Jove, 
                   Jesus Toro, Pedro Rodriguez, George Henriquez,
                   Francisco Ascanio & Alvaro Falcon 
  
Other Credits:  
Produced by Alvaro Falcon & Franco De Vita 
Production Assistant: Jose Sanchez Bello & Jose H. Mendez 
Recorded by Larry Hinds, Juan Carlos Socorro, Miguel Angel Larralde 
Recording Assistants: Paul Rangel, Manuel Guillermo & Enrique Barreto 
Sound Engineer in New York Dave Wonsey 
Recorded at Estudios Telearte (Caracas) Cuadraphonic Studio (New York)
 
Mixed by Larry Hinds, Alvaro Falcon, Franco De Vita, Magic Moreno, Juan Carlos Socorro & Miguel Angel Larralde  
Graphic Design: Valerio Do Carmo 
Cover Concept: Franco de Vita 
Cover Photos: Cesar Cuevas 
Band Photos: Xivars Briedis 
Inside Photos: Laureano Delgado & Mariano De Tovar
